quest.name: Smells Like Trouble
journal:
The Vath keeneye is covering his mandibles, trying not to snigger.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Goblins have requested a variety of herbs to be used in the filter of their masks. Because they requested so many, however, the Vath keeneye has decided to split up the work. He asks that you travel to Avalonia Fallen and retrieve leaves from two of the ten herbs requested─specifically, Danner sage and Whilom mint.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
You procure three leaves of Danner sage and Whilom mint respectively. Take them to the Vath keeneye at Loth ast Vath that he can finish preparing the goblins' order.

The Vath keeneye quickly prepares and packs the herbs for an impatient goblin waiting nearby. However, he does not seem eager to complete the delivery in person. He explains that the Vath have not yet grown accustomed to the peculiar look of goblin masks, and cannot help but laugh at the sight of them. Rather than offending his client, he asks that you take them over in his stead.
The goblin's anger is replaced with joy when he sees the fine selection of herbs you brought. He happily makes his way back to Idyllshire, practically singing of the profits he will make.
objectives: Deliver the mint and sage to the Vath keeneye.
Deliver the package of herbs to the goblin herbalist.

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: Tell me, great hunter, what do you think of the masks goblins wear? <click> <click> Quite whimsical, yes? We try not to laugh when we see them. It is very hard not to snicker. Yes, very hard.

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: The goblins say they are stuffed with various herbs, and change them often to suit their moods. They use many combinations of herbs for their masks, and now they ask for help collecting them.

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: We were asked to find ten varieties of herbs, but we have split up the work. <click> <click> Too much work for one alone. Yes, too much work. Will you gather two of the herbs for us?

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: You can find Danner sage and Whilom mint south of here in Avalonia Fallen. Three leaves of each should be all we require.

dialogue.name: GOBLIN02274
dialogue.text:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
We need ingredients to make special blend of smelling herbs, but the Vath are so slow!

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: Your timing is perfect, great hunter. One of the goblins has come for the herbs. <click> <click> We fear they are growing impatient. Do you have the herbs?

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: Excellent. Now we add these to the others, and... There. The package is ready.

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: We need you to deliver the herbs. Normally we would ourselves, but their masks...

dialogue.name: SEARCHER
dialogue.text: <click> <click> We are sure we will offend them with our laughter. Yes, very sure. Vath cannot help but chuckle when seeing their masks up close. They are too funny. You are used to their masks, yes?

dialogue.name: GOBLIN02274
dialogue.text: We can't wait anymore. Gobbies need smelling herbs for masks!

dialogue.name: GOBLIN02274
dialogue.text: Oh! Smelling herbs made with this will sell for much, much jinglyshine! Thank you.
